rules_text:
Haste
[i]Augmented[/i] – At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn, gain control of target nonland permanent until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: [i]“I've got this music in my mind saying it's gonna be alright.”[/i]
